metadata.description: Enterprise-grade Claude Code productivity suite with intelligent multi-agent orchestration for feature development, bug fixing, refactoring, idea exploration, and dependency management.

plugins.name: feature-orchestrator
plugins.description: Intelligent feature development with multi-agent orchestration. Claude automatically selects agents and models based on complexity analysis.

plugins.name: bug-fixer
plugins.description: Intelligent bug hunting and fixing workflow with root cause analysis, reproduction, and regression test generation.

plugins.name: refactor-pro
plugins.description: Safe code refactoring with architectural analysis, before/after comparisons, and automatic regression testing.

plugins.name: idea-lab
plugins.description: Design research phase for exploring ideas before technical implementation. Includes web research, competitive analysis, and user story development.

plugins.name: upgrade-deps
plugins.description: Safe dependency upgrades for Gradle, Maven, npm, and more. Includes breaking change detection, security scanning, and test verification.

plugins.name: claude-md-generator
plugins.description: Generates an intelligent CLAUDE.md file by analyzing codebase structure, tech stack, and fetching current best practices from the internet.
